attributes.action: Restore local democracy by abolishing the planning appeal process
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Developers are able to completely bypass the local democratic planning process by simply appealing against any decision. The appeal decision is made by a non-invested party, and makes the planning process preceding it totally worthless, and is made outside the context of other planning decisions made by local councils.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
